name: Lux
primaryTexts: Spend any amount of influence to gain 1 command token for every 3 influence spent
secondaryTexts: Spend any amount of influence to gain 1 command token for every 3 influence spent

name: Noctis
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to participate in the genome splice.

name: Tyrannus
primaryTexts: Choose a player other than the speaker. That player gains the speaker token
Choose a player other than the speaker or tyrant. That player gains the benediction token.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to draw 2 action cards.

name: Civitas
primaryTexts: Either place 1 structure on a planet you control, or use the PRODUCTION ability of 1 of your space docks.
Place 1 structure on a planet you control.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 structure on a planet you control.

name: Amicus
primaryTexts: Choose any number of other players. Those players use the secondary ability of this strategy card without spending a command token.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to replenish your commodities.

name: Calamitas
primaryTexts: Resolve the PRODUCTION abilities of your units in 1 system.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool and 4 resources to either participate in the unit upgrade splice or use the PRODUCTION abilities of the units in your home system.

name: Magus
primaryTexts: Initiate an ability splice. You may spend 3 resources and 3 influence to add 1 additional ability to the pool; if you do, after each player has chosen, it passes back to you and you take an additional ability.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool and 3 resources or 3 influence to participate in the ability splice.

name: Aeterna
primaryTexts: Immediately score 1 public objective if you fulfill its requirements; otherwise, draw 1 paradigm
Gain 1 victory point if you control Mecatol Rex; otherwise, draw 1 secret objective
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to draw 1 secret objective or 1 paradigm
